name: Furious Charge
description: Buff team ATK +[45 + 0.5/Lvl]% and Melee Physical attack an enemy for [98% base + 0.25%/level ATK] damage.

name: Rampage
description: Melee Physical attack on target and 1 other random target for [70% ATK] base damage.

name: Skull Cracker
description: Melee Physical attack an enemy [2+ 1 at Lvl 20]x for [40% ATK] base damage.

name: Swing
description: A basic Melee Physical attack doing [49.5% ATK] base damage.
